name: Gnome Mines Token V2
description: Gnome Mines is a Play 2 Earn game that you may like playing. A game in which players take charge of a gnome crew that is sent to work in a mine that contains precious ore. Every day, the gnomes get up early to go into the mines and gather as much ore as they can throughout the day. Get your best team together and go to the mines, where they may be rewarded for their efforts.
